column1: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.
Amazon EC2 for web server: reduce instance from m5.2xlarge to m5.xlarge
Amazon EC2 for app server: reduce instance from m5.2xlarge to m5.xlarge
My  application does not require the extra compute and memory capacity, so it is one reason to downsize an EC2 instance from m5.2xlarge to m5.xlarge is to reduce the cost of running the instance.
In additional, reduce Amazon RDS for MySQL have instance type from db.m5.4xlarge to db.m2.2xlarge to appropriate to project needs
